text: Herford () is a Kreis (district) in the northeastern part of North Rhine- Westphalia, Germany. ==Coat of arms== The black horse of Wittekind is depicted in the coat of arms of the district. After Wittekind was baptized Charlemagne gave him a white horse as present, which is now in the coat of arms of North Rhine-Westphalia and Lower Saxony. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities # Bünde # Enger # Herford # Löhne # Spenge # Vlotho # Hiddenhausen # Kirchlengern # Rödinghausen == References == ==Other websites== * Official website (German) * Herforder Pils
title: Herford (district)
